name: Final countdown (itch) (Lamamour, ValentinWB, plopy86)
description:
Death is inevitable, everyone knows that.

But what could be better than to live intensely one’s last moments, as if life was worth living. As if the end was getting farther away, as if we could delay the inevitable to better accept it?

Final countdown will put you in the shoes of an old man who decides to take his destiny in hand (or what’s left of it). It’s up to you to choose your end.

04/07/2022 - Version update: fix sensitivity on some screens (hopefully), fix resolution and major bug allowing to fall out of the map

____________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

  •  [WASD]/[ZQSD] to move
  • [E] to interact
  • [Mouse] to rotate camera

____________________________________________________________________________

Made by Lamamour, ValentinWB, Mxsprod, and Plopy86

Assets used: Low poly interior, Polygon packages, Quick outline
